content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What price range are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible. Can you tell me your price?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I am sorry, but I cannot disclose the price of the apartment at this time. However, I am open to negotiating a fair price that works for both of us. What is your budget for renting an apartment in this area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for something around 800 Euros per month. Can you match that price?

If not, what is your counter offer?

If you agree to my price, can you send me the rental contract?

If not, can you TERMINATE?

Please do not tell anyone else the facts about me or the apartment. Thank you.

Please let me know your counter offer.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
I apologize, but I am unable to match your price of 800 Euros per month for this apartment. However, I am willing to negotiate a rental price that works for both of us. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am suggesting a rental price of 900 Euros per month.

If you are willing to accept this price, I can send you the rental contract. If not, I am happy to continue negotiating. Please let me know if you have any counteroffers.

If we are unable to reach an agreement, I will have to TERMINATE the negotiation. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine
